name: smart-ralph (tzachbon)
description: [项目级] Spec-driven development with smart compaction. Claude Code plugin combining Ralph Wiggum loop with structured specification workflow.。来源: https://github.com/tzachbon/smart-ralph

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Spec-driven development with smart compaction. Claude Code plugin combining Ralph Wiggum loop with structured specification workflow.

来源: https://github.com/tzachbon/smart-ralph
语言: Shell
Stars: 173

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CLAUDE.md
CONTRIBUTING.md
LICENSE
README.md
TROUBLESHOOTING.md
docs
docs/plans
plugins
plugins/ralph-speckit
plugins/ralph-specum

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
/ralph-specum:start my-feature Add user authentication
```

When you run `/ralph-specum:start`:

1. If no index exists, you'll see a hint suggesting to run `/ralph-specum:index`
2. The spec scanner searches both regular specs AND indexed specs
3. Indexed components appear in "Related Specs" during research
